about_the_game:
Welcome to Pup Champs - a cozy tactical puzzle game where you guide a team of adorable pups through school league soccer matches. Use your wits to solve over 100 challenges and become the best team in the neighborhood!

PLAN YOUR ACTIONS

Just like in a thrilling match, every move you make counts. Piece together your strategy, align your long passes with well-timed crosses, and lead your team to victory.

BECOME A PUZZLE CHAMPION

Start on a bumpy neighborhood lawn and work your way up to the field of a district stadium. Each world offers a set of puzzles introducing new enemies and terrain hazards - watch out for monkeys following your moves, and don't lose the ball in the tall grass!

EXPERIENCE THE UNDERDOG'S TALE

As a retired soccer coach, use your experience and cunning to help out a bunch of clumsy pups become the Champs! Witness the daily struggles of rookies on the field, face their problems, and learn about the value of sportsmanship - all told through light-hearted comic strips.

ZERO UNDERSTANDING OF SOCCER REQUIRED

Not familiar with soccer terms like "offside"? No worries! Pup Champs is designed to be accessible to everyone. A series of carefully crafted puzzles will guide you to shine on the field and score game-winning goals.

name: Pup Champs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A tactical puzzle game about leading a soccer team of cute pups. Solve puzzles, score goals, and become the Champs!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
